subtitleIndex: Start Small, Think Big, Code Byte by Byte
aboutUsTextIndex: At ByteLab, our mission is to guide young minds into the world of coding through hands-on lessons, real projects, and interactive labs. We believe that the best way to learn programming is by creating, experimenting, and having fun along the way. Each course is carefully designed to build a strong foundation in backend development, databases, and modern technologies like .NET and C#. Whether students dream of becoming developers, engineers, or simply want to understand how technology works, ByteLab helps them take their first confident steps toward a future in tech.
aboutUsSyllabusIndex: You can watch our demo lessons and preview syllabus to see how we teach before book a course
featuresSubtitleIndex: Our approach combines comfort, creativity, and hands-on learning
featuresItem1TextIndex: Our programs are fully online, so you can learn without leaving home. We’re also preparing an on-site space that will open in the coming months.
featuresItem2TextIndex: Learn by doing! Each topic includes real coding practice and fun mini projects to build your skills step by step.
featuresItem3TextIndex: You can join our lessons in English or Azerbaijani, making learning easier and more comfortable for everyone.
featuresItem4TextIndex: Students can review the material after school, catch up easily, and never miss a topic.
servicesSubtitleIndex: Explore the services that bring your digital ideas to life.
servicesItem3Index: We design and build modern, responsive websites
codingDescIndex: Coding is more than typing lines on a screen — it’s the language of the future. Every app, game, and website you use was built by someone who knew how to code. It’s the skill that turns ideas into reality. When you learn coding, you learn how to think differently. You don’t just follow instructions — you solve problems, create things from nothing, and make technology work for you. From designing your own website to building smart systems that help people, coding gives you the power to shape the world around you. The earlier you start, the stronger your digital creativity becomes — and the future belongs to creators.
contatctSubTitleIndex: Reach out and take the next step in your learning journey
contactWpSubTitleIndex: Have a question? Send us a message and we’ll reply within 5 minutes!
portContact: For more information, get in touch with us!
saffarmaDesc: This project is an online drugstore stock management system, a modular backend solution built to power a scalable and maintainable enterprise-level application. Developed using layered Domain-Driven Design (DDD) and clean architecture principles, it efficiently separates concerns across data access, business logic, shared models, and localization resources. The system provides robust and secure RESTful APIs for managing inventory, users, and administrative operations. With integrated localization support and Dockerized deployment, it ensures flexibility, maintainability, and consistency across different environments—making it well-suited for modern DevOps workflows.
saffarmaFeature1: Dockerized deployment for easy environment setup
saffarmaFeature2: Administrative tools for managing users and operations
saffarmaFeature3: JWT-based token authentication ensuring secure API access
saffarmaFeature4: Scalable design suitable for enterprise-level applications
saffarmaTech1: ASP.NET Core for building secure, scalable APIs
saffarmaTech2: Entity Framework Core with code-first migrations
saffarmaTech3: Custom logic layer with DI and interfaces for testability
saffarmaTech4: Localization with .resx files and culture-based routing
saffarmaTech5: Docker & Docker Compose for containerized development
saffarmaTech6: Amazon S3 for scalable object storage (file/image uploads)
saffarmaNote: Click on the image or videos to see them fullscreen. Please note that the full code cannot be shared due to security reasons
travelDesc: This project is a robust backend system developed to power a travel platform enabling efficient management of destinations, bookings, and user data. Designed with clean architecture principles, it provides secure and scalable API services to support multiple client applications. The system focuses on reliable data processing, authentication, and business logic implementation, ensuring seamless integration with front-end clients or third-party services.
travelNote: Click on the image or videos to see them fullscreen. Please note that the full code cannot be shared due to security reasons
travelTech2: Entity Framework Core (Code First) for database management
travelTech3: SQL Server for reliable and structured data storage
travelTech4: Localization with .resx files and culture-based routing
travelTech5: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for stateless and secure authentication
travelFeature1: Search and filter destinations with detailed travel information
travelFeature2: Secure user authentication and profile management
travelFeature3: JWT-based token authentication ensuring secure API access
travelFeature4: Responsive design with a clean and intuitive user interface
isoDesc: This project is a two-part application developed to support and generate reports based on ISO standards. It enables users to enter, manage, and evaluate data efficiently while maintaining full compliance with ISO requirements. The system consists of two interconnected applications that communicate seamlessly through HttpContext and secure API integration, ensuring accurate and synchronized operations between modules. Advantages: - Digital solution for compiling day-to-day tasks and actions - Real-time monitoring of task implementation status - Ability to attach evidence documents - Automatic email notifications to responsible persons - Implementation reports for assigned actions - Each task is automatically numbered and registered
isoNote: Click on the image or videos to see them fullscreen. Please note that the full code cannot be shared due to security reasons
isoTech2: RESTful APIs with secure token-based communication
isoTech3: SQL Server for reliable and structured data storage
isoTech4: Role-based authorization and secure data access
isoFeature1: Data input, tracking, and validation based on ISO requirements
isoFeature5: Clear workflow and compliance monitoring modules
